vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.7;
son of: Cush (H3568);
brother of: Seba (H5434), Havilah (H2341H), Sabtah (H5454), Raamah (H7484) and Nimrod (H5248)
§ Sabtecha = "striking"
the 5th son of Cush
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Cus; descendiente de Cam
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒弗提迦 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "打擊"
古實的第五個兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒弗提迦 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "打击"
古实的第五个儿子
